Lakers News: Kobe Bryant Defends Luke Walton’s Performance Amid Injuries

Kobe Bryant believes blaming Luke is ridiculous.

“What’s he supposed to do? I mean you got half the team injured. That’s the part that drives me crazy… I’ll give you an example. People talk about Phil Jackson, they talk about Gregg Popovich and they say, ‘OK, well you won because you had Tim Duncan, Ginobili, and Parker. Or Phil, you won because you had Kobe and Shaq, or Michael.’ Who the hell is he supposed to win with? You know what I’m saying? And now you look at Luke’s situation here and having his key guys go down, what is he supposed to do? The fact that the team’s head is above water is amazing.”

replies.msg: in 字母 face 喇佢係度

Dlo致命一擊贏公鹿 - 今晚彷彿專殺Lopez的男人

Brook Lopez今天賽場上肯定不好過，除了自己進攻沒有打起來之外，在防守端此戰真的被D'Angelo Russell針對，不停被挑戰成功，那心裡肯定很不是滋味。

Dlo在這可能是決定球隊賽季生死的一役裡打出他東區明星球員的價值，全場進攻與組織都一把罩，繳出25分10助攻2抄截與66.7%的高效命中率。

這一勝讓布魯克林籃網又暫時衝到東區第六的位置，就現在四搶三的局面裡，忽然又成為優勢的領先者，所以今晚擊敗聯盟第一的公鹿實在太關鍵。

目前籃網的優勢在於對戰優勢都領先活塞與魔術，而戰績領先熱火(對戰劣勢)，在這激烈的處境下確實暫實能喘了一口氣，這也難怪賽後總教練Kenny Atkinson是整個笑開懷。

Dlo本季的蛻變成長應該會令他未來越來越強勢，下半季以後他幾乎都是對手針對嚴防的對象，所遭遇到的防守待遇已經不可同日而語。

Due to the immense amount of criticism that Lonzo gets on a game-to-game basis, the best way to show the impact he has on the game by providing you with the indisputable facts of the Lakers since Lonzo has been hurt. Just a warning, they aren’t pretty.

Through the first 47 games of the season, the Lakers defense was actually looking really good. Per nba.com, they had a defensive rating of 106.3, which was 6th in the NBA. They were 16th in opponents points per game averaging 111.4 and an overall net rating of 1.1, which was good enough for 14th in NBA, during that time. Now, remember, this is also with LeBron missing over a month due to injury.

Now we get to the Lonzo injury. In the 11 games since Lonzo went out, the Lakers have dropped to dead last in the NBA in opponent PPG giving up an average of 121.6 points per game.

Their defensive rating dropped to 116.8 (27th in the NBA) with an overall +/- of -10. That is bad enough for 2nd to last, in front of only the Phoenix Suns, who currently own the worst record in the NBA.

湖人曾試圖用波普和比斯利從公牛交易得到賈巴里-帕克

虎撲4月9日訊據The Athletic記者Bill Oram報導，聯盟消息人士透露，在1月25日的那個週末，湖人曾經達成了一筆暫定的交易送出肯塔維厄斯-考德威爾 -波普和邁克爾-比斯利，從公牛得到前鋒賈巴里-帕克。
然而，根據合同規定，波普必須同意任何涉及自己的交易，而他並沒有同意這筆交易。 消息人士透露，那個週末期間，公牛等待著波普同意交易。
這筆交易擱置到1月28日，鵜鶘球員安東尼-戴維斯提出了交易申請。 公牛此時意識到湖人在戴維斯的交易大戲結束之前會終止其他交易，因此他們決定放棄與湖人交易。 最終，公牛將帕克交易至奇才換取了奧托-波特。

Firing Luke Walton Could Continue Unfortunate Trend For Lakers

Talented young players like D’Angelo Russell, Julius Randle, and Ivica Zubac have been cast aside with little or no return.

The Lakers allowed Randle to walk away despite being a restricted free agent, opting to lose arguably the team’s best player in a quest to keep the deck clear for James and pursuing more stars.

Zubac was shipped across the hall to the Los Angeles Clippers at the trade deadline for Mike Muscala in a move that left many confused.

In Russell’s case, the Lakers actually gave up on two players too soon. They swapped Russell (and the toxic contract of Timofey Mozgov) for a draft pick and sweet-shooting big man Brook Lopez, who proved his worth and then some in one season in Los Angeles.

This pattern of moving on from assets who are on the upswing could very well extend to Walton as well. Instead, like Russell, Randle, and Zubac before him, Walton could very well wind up thriving after being shown the door. The Lakers could find themselves lamenting the loss of yet another piece of their former future.
